posts.post_content:
Selling off jsut a few more of my low grade cards thank to all who have bought some already. Still have some very nice ones left.

All can be seen on my community page under piedmont150's cards.

Paige SGC 20 Paper loss otherwise nice  55.00
Gasper Old Mill Very nice a and clean  50.00
Moeller PSA 2 slight glue stain no creases beautiful  39.00
Mattern SGC40 great color not sure what the problem is.. 40.00
CHarles PSA 2.. slight glue stain no creases beautiful  39.00
Hummel PSA 2 ditto ditto all of these have great corners 39.00
Frill PSA 2 even better!! 39.00
Burke Polar Bear.PSA 2 same story.. 39.00
Wright PSA 4 MK small pencil mark beautiful  39.00 SOLD!
Hoblitzel PSA 2.5  Same as the others   39.00 
Email is much preferred over PM 

Also the two packs one Piedmont and one Sweet Caporal are for sale 65.00 each both pretty nice. SOLD!
Enjoy..

Pm sent on a couple items.  Thanks.
Best,
Jeff
